Serves hundreds of millions of users globally with versatile AI capabilities including advanced reasoning, voice interactions, web search, image generation, data analysis, code generation, document processing, and custom GPT creation.

tools.name: Claude
tools.description: AI 'thinking partner' by Anthropic with Claude Opus, Sonnet, and Haiku models emphasizing safety and reasoning. Designed as a conversational AI assistant that excels at complex reasoning, analysis, and creative tasks while maintaining high safety standards.

tools.name: Gemini AI
tools.description: Google's personal AI assistant with multiple Gemini models (2.5 Flash, Pro, Deep Think). Offers everyday help, productivity enhancement, creativity, learning, and coding across various tasks with Deep Research capabilities, video generation using Veo models, and extensive Google ecosystem integration.

tools.name: Notion AI
tools.description: All-in-one AI workspace integrated into Notion that helps build, write, and automate tasks. Features agents for manual task automation, enterprise search across connected apps, AI meeting notes, database autofill, and workflow automation within the Notion workspace.

tools.name: Grammarly
tools.description: AI writing assistant trusted by 50K+ organizations and 40M users. Offers comprehensive editing, tone adjustment, brand voice, AI writing tools, plagiarism detection, citation generation, and enterprise features with tiered pricing from free to enterprise solutions.

tools.name: Grammarly Business
tools.description: Enterprise AI writing assistance solution for teams of all sizes. Combines AI with organizational knowledge to enhance communication, accelerate productivity, and ensure brand consistency. Features unlimited AI prompts, style guides, brand tones, and admin controls.

tools.name: Wordtune
tools.description: AI-powered paraphrasing tool and writing assistant with 10M+ users worldwide. Offers rewriting, paraphrasing, grammar checking, tone switching, summarization, and multilingual translation to English. Available across desktop, mobile, and browser extensions.

tools.name: Perplexity AI
tools.description: Free AI-powered answer engine providing accurate, trusted, and real-time answers to any question. Serves as an advanced research assistant that aggregates information from multiple web sources and AI models for comprehensive responses.

tools.name: Jasper AI
tools.description: Intelligent marketing AI platform built for marketing operations. Unifies brand voice, connects workflows, and automates the entire content lifecycle through intelligent Content Pipelines. Features AI agents, Canvas workspace, Brand Voice, and 100+ marketing apps.

tools.name: Anyword
tools.description: AI content platform with 82% performance prediction accuracy and 30% business outcomes lift. Offers predictive content scoring, A/B-tested data integration, brand voice control, and enterprise-grade security with private LLMs and compliance certifications.

tools.name: MarketingCopy AI
tools.description: AI-powered marketing copywriter with 70+ built-in tools for generating high-converting marketing copy. Creates content for ads, social media, websites, blogs, emails in 25+ languages with features for product descriptions, sales copy, and long-form writing assistance.

tools.name: RightBlogger
tools.description: Premium suite of 80+ AI blogging tools including unlimited AI article writer. Part of RyRob ecosystem, offers long-form SEO content generation (1,000-3,000+ words), tone selection, point of view control, stock images, source linking, and real-time data integration.

tools.name: ProWritingAid
tools.description: Essential toolkit for storytellers and writers with 4M+ users since 2012. Offers grammar checking, paraphrasing, manuscript analysis, virtual beta reader, chapter critique, marketability analysis, and Sparks inspiration tools with extensive app integrations.

tools.name: Wordvice AI
tools.description: AI grammar checker supporting 14+ languages with revision modes (Light, Standard, Intensive, Concise). Offers comprehensive grammar checking, paraphrasing, translation, and editorial comments. Integrates with Chrome extension and MS Word add-in for professional editing.

tools.name: Trinka AI
tools.description: Privacy-first grammar checker for academic and technical writing with 5-star ratings across multiple platforms. Supports 7 languages, offers enterprise security, confidential data plans, plagiarism checking, citation tools, and journal finder with compliance coverage.

tools.name: QuillBot
tools.description: Comprehensive AI writing platform with 35M+ users in 180+ countries. Offers paraphrasing, grammar checking, AI detection, plagiarism checking, summarization, translation, citation generation, and AI humanizer. Made at UIUC, part of Learneo Inc.

tools.name: Hemingway Editor
tools.description: Writing tool to make prose bold and clear by highlighting complex sentences and common errors. Offers Classic desktop app (non-AI), online analysis, and Editor Plus (AI-powered) with advanced grammar checking, tone adjustment, and readability scoring.

tools.name: Rytr
tools.description: AI writing assistant with 8M+ users offering 40+ templates for content generation. Supports 40+ languages, 20+ tones, plagiarism checks, and API access. Features AI autocomplete, blog generators, SEO tools, and business content creation with freemium pricing.

tools.name: RyRob AI Article Writer
tools.description: Free SEO-focused AI article generator creating short-form content (500-1,000 words) across 10+ languages. Uses GPT-4o technology, offers plagiarism-free content, and integrates with RightBlogger premium suite for unlimited long-form generation.

tools.name: Jenni AI
tools.description: AI research and academic writing assistant for 5M+ academics worldwide. Supports 2,600+ citation styles, integrates with Zotero and Mendeley, offers AI autocomplete, agentic chat, source-based generation, and exports to multiple formats (.docx, .tex, .html).

tools.name: Sudowrite
tools.description: AI writing partner for fiction writers using 2 dozen LLMs including Muse 1.5 model. Features Story Bible, character development, scene expansion, feedback tools, and narrative analysis. Supports creative writing with $10/month subscription and free trial.

tools.name: Novelcrafter
tools.description: Comprehensive online writing platform for authors with 131K+ authors. Features The Codex (wiki system), planning modes, series support, collaboration tools, and smart AI that connects to multiple AI models (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, local models).

tools.name: Squibler
tools.description: AI scriptwriter and novel writer with 20,000+ users. Generates entire scripts from ideas, offers outline generation, smart writing tools, character/setting development, visuals generation, and project management. Free trial available with pricing details on website.

tools.name: Otter.ai
tools.description: AI Meeting Agent for live transcription, automated summaries, and action items. Provides 95% transcription accuracy, integrates with 500,000+ apps, offers AI chat for meeting insights, and supports multiple languages. Free and paid tiers starting at $19.99/month.

tools.name: Paperpal
tools.description: AI-powered academic writing tool for 3M+ academics in 125+ countries. Processes 10Bn+ words, offers grammar checking, paraphrasing, research & citation tools, PDF chat, plagiarism checking, and submission readiness checks with ISO/IEC 27001 certification.

tools.name: Suno AI
tools.description: AI music generation tool creating songs from text prompts. Offers freemium model with 10 songs/day free, Pro plan with 500 songs/month and commercial rights. Top 10 music app on iOS (4.9 rating) and Android (4.8 rating) with advanced editing features.

tools.name: Canva Magic Write
tools.description: AI text generator integrated into Canva design platform, powered by OpenAI. Offers 25 queries free for users, 250/month for Pro/Teams, supports 20+ languages, and includes tools for brainstorming, outlining, rewriting, and content expansion within Canva ecosystem.

tools.name: Copymatic
tools.description: AI-powered content and copy generator with GPT-3, supporting 40+ languages. Offers long-form article generation, SEO optimization, automation features (scheduling, linking, rank tracking), and subscription plans from $19/month with free trial credits.

tools.name: Google Bard (Gemini)
tools.description: Google's conversational AI assistant (now rebranded as Gemini) offering multimodal capabilities, integration with Google services, and various model options. Provides web search, image generation, and creative writing assistance through Google's AI ecosystem.

tools.name: Microsoft Copilot
tools.description: Microsoft's AI assistant integrated across Office 365, Windows, and web services. Offers writing assistance, content generation, research capabilities, and integration with Microsoft Office applications for productivity and content creation.

tools.name: Bing Chat (Copilot)
tools.description: Microsoft's AI-powered search and chat assistant integrated into Bing search engine. Provides real-time web search, content generation, and research assistance with access to current information and citations.

tools.name: You.com
tools.description: AI-powered search engine and writing assistant that combines web search with AI capabilities. Offers multiple AI models, writing tools, and research assistance with integrated search functionality.

tools.name: Poe
tools.description: Platform providing access to multiple AI models including Claude, ChatGPT, and others in a single interface. Offers writing assistance, conversation capabilities, and access to various AI personalities and tools.

tools.name: Sora
tools.description: OpenAI's revolutionary text-to-video generation model capable of creating up to a minute-long videos while maintaining visual quality and prompt adherence. Features storyboard functionality, image animation, and community-driven remix capabilities.

tools.name: Runway
tools.description: AI-powered video generation and editing platform featuring Gen-4 model for dynamic video creation, Aleph for editing transformations, and Act-Two for directing emotion and voice inflections. Offers comprehensive AI tools with professional-grade output.

tools.name: Luma Dream Machine
tools.description: Advanced AI video generation tool powered by Ray3 and Photon models. Offers 16-bit HDR video generation, physics simulation, character consistency, and brainstorming interface for creative video production.

tools.name: HeyGen
tools.description: Leading AI avatar platform with 175+ language support, real-time interactive avatars, voice cloning, and video translation. Trusted by 100,000+ teams with enterprise-grade security compliance.

tools.name: Pika
tools.description: User-friendly AI video generator with creative effects like 'Pikapocalypse' and reality-altering features. Offers simple controls for generating videos with camera movements and stylish visual effects.

tools.name: Sora
tools.description: OpenAI's revolutionary text-to-video generation model capable of creating up to a minute-long videos while maintaining visual quality and prompt adherence. Features storyboard functionality, image animation, and community-driven remix capabilities.

tools.name: InVideo AI
tools.description: Comprehensive AI video creation platform offering prompt-to-video generation, AI avatar creation, voice cloning, video translation, and intelligent editing. Supports multiple languages with templates for social media content.

tools.name: Luma Dream Machine
tools.description: Advanced AI video generation tool powered by Ray3 and Photon models. Offers 16-bit HDR video generation, physics simulation, character consistency, and brainstorming interface for creative video production.

tools.name: Pika
tools.description: User-friendly AI video generator with creative effects like 'Pikapocalypse' and reality-altering features. Offers simple controls for generating videos with camera movements and stylish visual effects.

tools.name: LTX Studio
tools.description: Professional AI video creation platform by Lightricks offering extreme creative control with character management, scene breakdown, and comprehensive video editing features. Targets short film production.

tools.name: Pictory
tools.description: AI-powered video creation tool perfect for converting text, blogs, and presentations into videos. Offers branding features, templates, and automated visual selection for marketing and social media content.

tools.name: Vyond
tools.description: Animated character video platform with AI-powered motion capture and text-to-video generation. Features Vyond Go for automated content creation and extensive customization options.

tools.name: Fliki
tools.description: Text-to-video platform with 2500+ ultra-realistic AI voices across 80+ languages. Trusted by 50,000+ companies with advanced voice cloning and multimedia conversion capabilities.

tools.name: revid.ai
tools.description: AI video generator with extensive template library and social media automation. Features TikTok integration, auto-mode for daily video creation, and multiple repurposing formats.

tools.name: Google Veo 3
tools.description: Google DeepMind's advanced video generation model featuring exceptional realism, integrated audio, and lip-sync. Offers cinematic storytelling with low skill requirements for high-quality outputs.

tools.name: Kling AI
tools.description: High-quality AI video generator known for competitive results compared to Sora and Veo 3. Offers advanced video generation capabilities with professional-grade output quality.

tools.name: MiniMax
tools.description: Advanced AI video generation platform offering specialized tools for subject reference and advanced camera movement control. Part of the next generation of video AI tools.

tools.name: Descript
tools.description: Revolutionary text-based video editor allowing users to edit videos by editing transcripts. Features voice cloning, automatic transcription, and seamless video/audio alignment with enterprise-grade collaboration tools.

tools.name: Adobe Premiere Pro
tools.description: Professional video editing software with comprehensive AI-powered enhancements including automated color correction, scene detection, background noise removal, and AI-assisted captions.

tools.name: Wondershare Filmora
tools.description: Beginner-friendly AI video editor with powerful features including AI background removal, auto-reframe, smart scene detection, AI-powered text-to-speech, and voice enhancement.
